extendedInfo.description: Hawaii News Now delivers the latest news, sports, interactive weather radar and video directly to your mobile device. Stay connected no matter where you go with comprehensive coverage for Hawaii. When news and weather breaks the Hawaii News Now app is your âall access passâ to the latest stories. Other features include:- Local, Regional and National coverage.- Real-time breaking news alerts so you can follow stories as they happen.- Deep weather forecast information.- Contribute your stories, images and video to HNN by uploading directly from your mobile device.- Side menu tray navigation for quick access to the news you need.- Live Streaming support on 4.x devices (Ice Cream Sandwich, Jelly Bean)- Universal app for phone and tablet devices (tablets include multi-pane reading).NBC (KHNL 8) and CBS (KGMB 9) affiliates serving the Hawaiian Islands.

reviews.title: The show is great too
reviews.comment: This is the perfect companion app to the Sunrise show in the morning.  I am a news junkie and this app satisfies my appetite for news!
reviews.author: Stacy Naipo

reviews.title: 5 STAR RATINGS!
reviews.comment: Excellent services! Very best PUSH NOTIFICATIONS, Mahalo.
reviews.author: Glenn Hu

reviews.title: One of the best news apps out there.
reviews.comment: Ads are probably a necessary evil... HNN relatively unobtrusive ads handling makes them tolerable. Topical and relevant stories make it useful e en when away from the islands.
reviews.author: Jin Ok

reviews.title: Got worse
reviews.comment: Use to alert me to news items then all of a sudden it stopped. And doesnt connect as easily as a year ago.
reviews.author: Tyler Chan

reviews.title: I give up!!!
reviews.comment: Takes forever to load.  I want to see the news now,  not in 3 mins
reviews.author: jay fake

reviews.title: Excellent App.
reviews.comment: Simple and easy to use. User friendly UI. Streaming videos on news topics and weather forecasts anytime and everywhere u go. Keep up the good work, devs !! :-)
reviews.author: Rex Medina

reviews.title: 5 stars.
reviews.comment: The app seemed to finally upgrade its features. About time. Good job though. It was worth to redown load.
reviews.author: Gomez Willis

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Good most of the time but crashes often and sometimes not updated as much as I would like.
reviews.author: katie stevens

reviews.title: Not able to update articles.
reviews.comment: Disappointed with the update. I\'m not able to get up to date news articles because it just trying to load with no success its just showing the loading symbol. Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Video buffering...Cause
reviews.comment: Takes a lot longer to load video\'s & video buffers often on this  android app while the  iPhone app has no problems, fix that then it\'ll be a 5 star app. >Update< Buffering issue was caused by other installed apps that was auto synced with my smartphone.
reviews.author: Ivan Yamanaka

reviews.title: Emergency management
reviews.comment: The best way to keep in touch with local news during an emergency.
reviews.author: john aylett

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Simple to navigate, all u need is in one place...
reviews.author: Althea Freitas

reviews.title: Great local new source
reviews.comment: Way better than before, finally fixed notifications delivery system, clean, fast works. Mytouch 4g.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Motorola RAZR Max HD
reviews.comment: Does not play videos or live stream on my razor Max HD. When it does play the audio lags from video playing. Worked perfectly fine with my old thunderbolt. I give the HNN app a failing grade as if right now. HNN please fix the problem.
reviews.author: Rome C

reviews.title: Great local news app!
reviews.comment: Pros: updated feeds on current events and breaking news! It is also very helpful during natural disasters.   Cons: takes a little while to load because it will sink all the latest updates, instead of taking you directly to the news flash.  For what it is worth though I would recommend it! Aloha
reviews.author: Jimmy Brown

reviews.title: Great news app!
reviews.comment: Best phone app for for Hawaii weather as well local news. Also great for your national/international news curiousity.
reviews.author: Angela Fors

reviews.title: Horrible since new updat
reviews.comment: Never loads now and never refreshes.  I will find a different news station app.
reviews.author: Catherine Enos

reviews.title: Pls bring back Original App
reviews.comment: Original app worked  great. If it\'s NOT BROKEN, why try to fix it??? All kinds of problems from inability to forward stories in the portrait position b/c icon not visible &  from Menu button greyed out so doesn\'t work. Trying to read from black type on white background...very hard on the eyes. Also, inability to forward to email like Hotmail... only Gmail on list... Note: Not everyone uses Gmail b/c it\'s not that user friendly! Pls do something or you\'re going to lose tons of viewers!
reviews.author: RUTHANN MCGARRY

reviews.comment: Easy to use and always up to date!
reviews.author: Dan Walters

reviews.title: Finicky
reviews.comment: Sometimes it loads the news, sometimes it doesn\'t.
reviews.author: Joshua Manning
